CoPilot¶

Note

This page Contains Python Library Definitions For XIQ CoPilot Menu

CoPilot¶

class xiq.flows.copilot.Copilot.Copilot¶

Bases: xiq.elements.CopilotWebElements.CopilotWebElements

dismiss_anomaly_in_wifi_capacity(location_name, option)¶

  • This Keyword dismiss an anomaly for location based on provided option

  • If option provided is ‘yes’ it will dismiss anomaly else it won’t dismiss

  • Flow: CoPilot–> Wi-Fi CAPACITY —> Get Location Name and dismiss anomaly

  • Keyword Usage:

  • Dismiss Anomaly In WiFi Capacity   ${LOCATION_NAME}    ${OPTION}

Parameters

  • location_name – Location name to enable anomaly Pin in wifi capacity widget

  • option – confirmation option to delete anomaly(options: yes, no)

Returns

1 if able to perform dismiss operation with provided option, -1 if anomaly not found

get_anomaly_details_for_location_in_anomaly_notification_icon(location_name)¶

  • This keyword will return total notification rows displaying and row details matching the location name after clicking anomaly Notification icon

  • Flow : Click Anomaly Notification Icon –> Check Notification entries list

  • Keyword Usage

  • ${ROW_INFO}  ${ROW_COUNT} = Get Anomaly Details For Location In Anomaly Notification Icon  ${LOCATION_NAME}

Parameters

location_name – Location name to verify in anomaly Notification Entries

Returns

if notification entries found returns Total rows and location name matched row information in dictionary format else -1

get_links_present_in_wifi_capacity_additional_resources()¶

  • This keyword will get the both video and documentation url Links From WiFi Capacity Additional Resources Page

  • Flow : Copilot page –>WiFi capacity widget–> Video Icon —> Additional Resources

  • Keyword Usage

  • ${DOCS_URL_LIST}    ${VIDEO_URL_LIST} =     Get Links Present In WiFi Capacity Additional Resources

Returns

${DOCS_URL_LIST} Documentation URL Links available in WiFi Capacity Additional Resources Page in a list

Returns

${VIDEO_URL_LIST} Video URL Links available in WiFi Capacity Additional Resources Page in a list

get_total_assurance_scan_count()¶

  • Gets total scan count in Assurance scan widget

  • Flow : Copilot page –>Assurance Scan widget

  • Keyword Usage

  • Get Total Assurance Scan Count

  • This keyword developed on q3r1 - g7r1 environment.

Returns

returns 1 if success else returns -1

get_total_numbers_of_anomalies_detected()¶

  • This Keyword will Get Total Number of Anomalies Notification Detected.

  • Keyword Usage:

  • Get Total Numbers Of Anomalies Detected

:return:Total anomalies count if notification found else -1

get_wifi_capacity_widget_summary()¶

  • Gets wifi capacity widget summary in copilot

  • Flow : Copilot page –>Wifi Capacity widget

  • Keyword Usage

  • Get WiFi Capacity Widget Summary

  • This keyword developed on q3r1 - g7r1 environment.

Returns

returns Buildings and APs count if success else returns -1

hide_muted_anomaly_in_wifi_capacity_widget(location_name)¶

  • This keyword hides the muted anomalies

  • Flow : Copilot page –>WiFi capacity widget

  • Keyword Usage

  • Hide Muted Anomaly In WiFi Capacity Widget         ${LOCATION_NAME}

Parameters

location_name – Location name to verify in WiFi capacity widget

Returns

returns 1 if success else returns -1

mute_anomaly_for_location_in_wifi_capacity_widget(location_name)¶

  • This Keyword will mute an anomaly at building level in wifi capacity widget

  • Flow: CoPilot–> Wi-Fi CAPACITY —> Get Location Name in Rows and Click More options and mute Button

  • Keyword Usage:

  • Mute Anomaly For location In WiFi Capacity Widget   ${LOCATION_NAME}

Parameters

location_name – Location name to Mute anomaly in wifi capacity widget

Returns

1 if able to click anomaly Mute button for the Location Name or already clicked else -1

navigate_to_copilot_through_view_all_anomaly()¶

  • This Keyword navigates to Copilot Anomaly Notification Icon

  • Clicks on view all button and validates whether we are in Copilot page or not

  • Flow: Login–> Click on View ALl of copilot Anomaly —> Copilot page

  • Keyword Usage:

  • Navigate To Copilot Through View All Anomaly

Returns

1 if Navigation Successful else -1

pin_anomaly_for_location_in_wifi_capacity_widget(location_name)¶

  • This Keyword will pin an anomaly at building level in wifi capacity widget

  • Flow: CoPilot–> Wi-Fi CAPACITY —> Get Location Name in Rows and Click Pin Button

  • Keyword Usage:

  • Pin Anomaly For location In WiFi Capacity Widget   ${LOCATION_NAME}

Parameters

location_name – Location name to enable anomaly Pin in wifi capacity widget

Returns

1 if able to click anomaly Pin button for the Location Name or already clicked else -1

pin_individual_ap_for_location_in_wifi_capacity_widget(location_name, ap_name)¶

  • This Keyword will pin an AP at building level in wifi capacity widget

  • Flow: CoPilot–> Wi-Fi CAPACITY —> click Location Name in Rows –> Click AP row pin Button

  • Keyword Usage:

  • Pin Individual AP For Location In WiFi Capacity Widget   ${LOCATION_NAME}  ${AP_NAME}

Parameters

  • location_name – Location name to enable anomaly Pin in wifi capacity widget

  • ap_name – AP name to enable pin in wifi capacity widget of particular location

Returns

1 if able to click pin button for the AP in Location or already pinned else -1

show_muted_anomalies_in_wifi_capacity_widget(location_name)¶

  • This keyword shows the muted anomalies

  • Flow : Copilot page –>WiFi capacity widget

  • Keyword Usage

  • Show Muted Anomalies In WiFi Capacity Widget               ${LOCATION_NAME}

Parameters

location_name – Location name to verify in WiFi capacity widget

Returns

returns 1 if success else returns -1

unmute_anomaly_for_location_in_wifi_capacity_widget(location_name)¶

  • This Keyword will unmute an anomaly at building level in wifi capacity widget

  • Flow: CoPilot–> Wi-Fi CAPACITY —> Get Location Name in Rows and Click More options and unmute Button

  • Keyword Usage:

  • Unmute Anomaly For location In WiFi Capacity Widget   ${LOCATION_NAME}

Parameters

location_name – Location name to unMute anomaly in wifi capacity widget

Returns

1 if able to click anomaly unMute button for the Location Name or already clicked else -1

unpin_anomaly_for_location_in_wifi_capacity_widget(location_name)¶

  • This Keyword will unpin an anomaly at building level in wifi capacity widget

  • Flow: CoPilot–> Wi-Fi CAPACITY —> Get Location Name in Rows and Click UnPin Button

  • Keyword Usage:

  • Unpin Anomaly For location In WiFi Capacity Widget   ${LOCATION_NAME}

Parameters

location_name – Location name to enable anomaly Pin in wifi capacity widget

Returns

1 if able to click anomaly unpin button for the Location Name or already unpinned else -1

unpin_individual_ap_for_location_in_wifi_capacity_widget(location_name, ap_name)¶

  • This Keyword will unpin an AP at building level in wifi capacity widget

  • Flow: CoPilot–> Wi-Fi CAPACITY —> click Location Name in Rows –> Click AP row Unpin Button

  • Keyword Usage:

  • Unpin Individual AP For Location In WiFi Capacity Widget   ${LOCATION_NAME}  ${AP_NAME}

Parameters

  • location_name – Location name to enable anomaly Unpin in wifi capacity widget

  • ap_name – AP name to enable unpin in wifi capacity widget of particular location

Returns

1 if able to click unpin button for the AP in Location or already unpinned else -1
